about_the_game: Welcome to your first day on the job! Before any major crash tests can take place today, the test facility must be calibrated. Your directive is to fire up the facility by running a simple but crucial test using one of the crash test carts and the portable crash test barrier. Make sure the data recorders, measurement arm, and tunnel catapults are all operating on target. All future crashes initiated will depend on how well the system gets calibrated. Good luck!
detailed_description: Welcome to your first day on the job! Before any major crash tests can take place today, the test facility must be calibrated. Your directive is to fire up the facility by running a simple but crucial test using one of the crash test carts and the portable crash test barrier. Make sure the data recorders, measurement arm, and tunnel catapults are all operating on target. All future crashes initiated will depend on how well the system gets calibrated. Good luck!
name: Crash Effects Inc. Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit - Home
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 6th Gen or Better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or greater / Radeon RX 400 series or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit - Home
  • Processor: Intel Core-i7 6th Gen or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX-2070 or greater / Radeon 5700 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
